programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7
programme.desc: Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Wild Seas Ep5
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - iSimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Wild Fortresses Ep3
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Critical Plains Ep10
programme.desc: While the Ol Pejeta staff help move a herd of hartebeest to another park, an ailing eland is spotted. Suffering from a wound from an illegal trap, the massive antelope will have to be tranquilized and treated before it's too late. After the eland is dealt with, a baby hartebeest will need to be herded back with her main group of antelope.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - Return of the African Titans Ep1
programme.desc: There are eight North African white rhinos left in the world and only four are of breeding age. With the clock ticking on their species, an international mission has been working for several years to move the four to Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Rhythm of the Bay Ep1
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North Americas largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere.The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now its a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Familys lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader whos eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 2 - Rhythm of the Bay Ep1
programme.desc: The Hudson Bay lowlands are part of North Americas largest wetland. Over 300,000 square kilometers of muskeg, a vast bogland as far as the eye can see characterized by water soaked peat, mosses and stunted trees. Once thought of as barren wasteland, it is now understood that these bogs are crucially important to life on earth. Globally, there is as much carbon dioxide held in wetlands as there is in the atmosphere.The peatland ecosystem is the most efficient carbon sink on the planet.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Karoo Ep4
programme.desc: In the center of South Africa is an ancient landscape that was once an inland sea. Now its a mosaic of unique habitats. Life here has evolved ingenious solutions to survive. There is nowhere in South Africa quite like the Karoo National Park.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - Return of the African Titans Ep1
programme.desc: There are eight North African white rhinos left in the world and only four are of breeding age. With the clock ticking on their species, an international mission has been working for several years to move the four to Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 9 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 2 - The Gate of the Mist Ep2
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta sits in the shadow of Mount Kenya the second highest peak in Africa. It has one of the most beautiful sunrises in all of Africa.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Waterberg - Mountains of Life Ep1
programme.desc: In the Limpopo region of South Africa lies an ancient land. From rolling grasslands to rocky gorges, wildlife has learnt to make the most of whats on offer. This is the Waterberg, a land of plenty.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Vrederfort Dome - Crater of Life Ep2
programme.desc: In this programme we look at the Vredefort Crater in South Africa and the life it supports. From rocky outcrops to grassland, and from wetlands to mighty rivers, each habitat provides a niche for a host of creatures.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Africa's Great Oasis - the Okavango Ep3
programme.desc: Trapped in one of Africas great deserts is a lush, hidden world. It is an untamed wilderness unlike any other on Earth. Fed by a mighty river that travels from distant mountains, it is a vast mosaic of life, which pulsates with vivid beauty.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Wild Swaziland Ep4
programme.desc: Despite its small size, Swaziland boasts Big Five status and some 132 species of mammals have been recorded there. Giraffe, hippo, zebra, and a variety of antelope can be found across the country, as can predators such as jackals and hyenas.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - The Kalahari Ep5
programme.desc: An immense, dry land dominates southwestern Africa. Here, sand covers the land in rippling dunes and rain drains away as quickly as it falls. Kalahari, meaning "place of great thirst," is an appropriate name for one of southern Africas greatest wildernesses.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 - Ngorongoro Crater - Cursed Heaven Ep6
programme.desc: This episode explores Tanzania's Ngorongoro Crater. It looks at what lies within the craters walls and examines how the surrounding areas impact life within Ngorongoro.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Music Player - Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep22
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.desc: A New York Minute - Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep11
programme.desc: Tanaka's Moving Castle / Zenko Don't Go - Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sleepy Toys - Everyone in Brickabuild keeps falling asleep and no one can get any building work finished. It's all because the lights keep coming on all night! Noddy decides to investigate who is turning the lights on. Bravely overcoming his own fear of the dark, he follows the clues to discover that the lights are being secretly turned on by a scared Carlton, who doesn't like the dark. Kind Noddy tells him that he's not the only one scared of the dark and after Carlton is given a cuddle device to cuddle, everyone can get a good night's sleep! Sleep tight, Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock but the damage has been done. Eagle Mama Hen's best friend decides to lend Hen her most prized possession A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep5
programme.desc: Car Boot Sale - Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep6
programme.desc: Hot Stuff - Big Chris takes the cars to the beach to relax in the heat but he is so busy dealing with the cars he forgets to drink his water. But hang on, who else has drunk it

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep23
programme.desc: Shock And Awe - When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep23
programme.desc: The King Who Would Be King - Fred the Giant Scorpion vows revenge after he reads an untrue story about himself in King Julien's new book.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1015
programme.desc: Pups Save a Baby Caribou - When a baby caribou winds up speeding down a mountainside. It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the calf and reunite him with his family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1012
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Foggy Skies - Mayor Humdinger tries pushing fog into Adventure Bay, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find animals missing in the clouds and save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Knights of the Snack Table - Sir Joshalot and the Knights of the Snack Table are on an epic quest through the neighborhood to find a special treat for the afternoon snack feast! Throughout their journey, the knights demonstrate the most knightly of qualities-helping others.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1015
programme.desc: Pups Save a Baby Caribou - When a baby caribou winds up speeding down a mountainside. It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the calf and reunite him with his family.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1012
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Foggy Skies - Mayor Humdinger tries pushing fog into Adventure Bay, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find animals missing in the clouds and save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Secret Island / Astrobot - Lady Fluffpot visits a secret island with Steel to find a birthday present from her cousin Adventure Alex. // Muffin's plan to get Dinobot into trouble goes disastrously wrong when the pair get trapped with Lola in an out-of-control Space Shuttle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Ultra Shell Returns / Cham Cham Champion / Sing Your Voice Out - Ultra Shell and Wonder Bear return. // Bossy gets carried away when playing a new game. // After losing his voice, Bossy must do the one thing he's terrible at: being quiet.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Tina's New Friend - While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bee - Dee encourages a friend to say 'bee' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bees. There are stripy bees, buzzy bees, and yellow, black and fuzzy bees.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Phoebe's Hotel - As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Messy-power - Hey, who turned out the lights? Messy goes to OKIDO and finds out electricity can lead to music, lights and disco dancing!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Mr Monkeyjocks - Dad thinks the kids have too many toys and suggests a chuck out. To save their beloved Mr Monkeyjocks from getting the chop, Bluey and Bingo must prove he is special.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep50
programme.desc: The Surprise Badge - The squirrels and Duggee buy Hennie a surprise present for her birthday - but first they need to wrap it up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep49
programme.desc: The Sewing Badge - Duggee is sewing and makes a snazzy poncho, inspiring the squirrels to make one too. When they hear a very loud sneeze, the group investigates and finds a polar bear with a cold.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Detective Badge - A freshly baked apple pie is swiped from Duggee's windowsill, so he dons his detective badge to track down the thief.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy for Muffin. At his wit's end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the girls' miming.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Postman - When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Andy and the Damselflies - Andy jets off to the South of France to see where damselflies lay their eggs.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Road Making Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that help make roads! Grace helps operate a road planer, checks out a road-printing machine and then has a go in a road paver!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Slime v Slop - Captain Hey Ho instructs Cook and Line to find out which is more useful: slime or slop. The boys are happy to get to work and set up some experiments to put both substances to the test.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep14
programme.desc: The Family Photo Badge - The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family, earning their Family Photo Badges and a brilliant group picture in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep13
programme.desc: The Breakfast Badge - Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh! Luckily Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Pan-American Highway, Panama - The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep15
programme.desc: Muddy Matters - It is the day of the Farmer's Fair on Sodor. The Fat Controller arrives at Tidmouth Sheds to give the engines their duties for the day. One engine is to take Farmer McColl's sheep to the fair and that engine will have his photograph taken for the daily ne

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Toggle Tangle - After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Bubble Bumbling - The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Night-Time Sun - Nelly and Nora discover that the sun at night-time is a very special present.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dog Loves Heroes - Dog and Pug meet two hapless superheroes trying to outdo each other to save the city. But a little girl they meet prefers Pug's Power Pug, so he becomes the hero.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Wish List - Monty talks about his friend Barnaby who seems to have every toy imaginable. This leads to him and Jimmy Jones to wonder what it would be like to have whatever you want.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep11
programme.desc: It's Time to go Swimming - JoJo and Gran Gran go swimming in a lido on a hot summer day. JoJo is excited to show Gran Gran what she has learnt in her recent swimming lessons.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep8
programme.desc: On The Bright Side - Kid Po Bo has created an awesome city garden - but he may not have chosen the best location. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Puzzlin' Tool Wall - Logi-Po's tools fit neatly on the wall - so, when Doug-Po knocks them down, can the rest of the team put everything back together?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Baddie Belt - Evil Pea swaps Supertato's Tato-Belt with her evil Baddie-Belt which has absurd and baffling functions. Supertato has to work out how to rescue Carrot and Pea with the Baddie Belt.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Chilli to the Rescue - Chilli decides to become a superhero called Super Chilli! His superhero skills are put to the test when Evil Pea covers Supertato in sticky honey. Chilli's heat saves the day.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep208
programme.desc: Snooze You Lose / Krusty Katering - Squidward is so tired that SpongeBob & Patrick can't wake him up, but they won't let him miss his big audition! // Mr. Krabs & his crew cater a fancy party, but they might be out of their depth with their new wealthy customers.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: Patnocchio - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting - Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Dr. Sleep / Davey Boy - In an effort to be more productive, Simon invents a device that can override the need to sleep. But does it work? // Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: The Road Warrior / My Fair Chipette - Alvin sounds the alarm when he believes Theodore has joined a motorcycle gang of vampires! // When Brittany declines Alvin's help for a talent show, he convinces Jeanette to enter, putting them at odds.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep279
programme.desc: Welcome to Binary Bottom / You're Going to Pay...Phone / A Skin Wrinkle - In an alternate reality, Bikini Bottom is inhabited entirely by robots. // Mr. Krabs installs a cursed payphone in the Krusty Krab. / GrandPat travels through time to get home.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep280
programme.desc: Abandon Twits / Wallhalla - The Krusty Krew builds a boat for their penny-pinching captain. // SpongeBob discovers a crazed castaway living in his walls.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep264
programme.desc: Patrick's Tantrum - Patrick goes into a destructive fit whenever he hears a bell, so his friends help him in their own ways.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep107
programme.desc: What About Meep? / Hard Time Out - When an unsatisfied anchovy strays from his brothers, SpongeBob and Patrick must help him find his true identity. // SpongeBob is sent to time out on behalf of his buddy, so Patrick does what he can to rectify the situation.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Scoop Snoop / Eye Can't - The Action News Team struggles to find out how Katherine Mulligan is scooping their news leads. // Trying to avoid a trip to the eye doctor, Lisa makes a new pair of glasses that actually makes her eyesight worse.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Last Laugh / Driver's Dread - Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge when she replaces him with Lola in her act. // Hoping to drive out to the outlets to meet Lori, Leni ooks for alternative ways to get her driver's license.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Sitting Bull / The Spies Who Love Me - The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. // Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think it's too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching / Krusty Kleaners - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party! // After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep288
programme.desc: Dopey Dick / Plankton and the Beanstalk - Squidward joins a crew of sailors hunting down the great white jellyfish. // Plankton finds a magic bean that takes him to a land of giants (well, more giant than usual).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep276
programme.desc: Say 'Awww!' - Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!"

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Patrick Show Sells Out / Neptune's Ball - The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors. // The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Bunstoppable - While preparing bao for the Chinese Cultural Fair, Sid and Adelaide face off against time-hopping bandits!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation Popstar - Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep261
programme.desc: Lighthouse Louie / Hiccup Plague - SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep167
programme.desc: Bubble Buddy Returns - While Bubble Buddy's son, Shiny, is visiting, SpongeBob tries desperately to keep him out of trouble and away from sharp edges.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Secret Museum of Kung Fu - With Po and the Furious Five at each other's throats, Shifu takes them all on a disastrous road trip.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Terror Cotta - Fung finds an old scroll with instructions for making living terra cotta warriors, and soon it's up to Po and the Five to stop his monstrous clay creation.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep310
programme.desc: The Day of Black Sun Part 1: The Invasion - It is the Day of Black Sun and the group meets up with the invasion force."The day has finally arrived and Aang is ready to take on the Fire Lord.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep311
programme.desc: P.E.L.T. - Skipper's losing it. He has to prove he can still lead the squad.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Operation: Lunacorn Apocalypse - The Penguins are faced with a World Domination battle when Private accidentally unleashes KuchiKukhan the Destroyer of Worlds. Can they stop him in time to save the World?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Nuts to You / The Terror of Madagascar - Fred the Squirrel has hit the jackpot. He stumbles onto a jackpot oak tree which is loaded with acorns (that's tons of money to animal folk). // When a Baby Fossa is delivered to the Zoo everyone is excited except for King Julien.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Hawk Man / Jammy Good! - Parker meets Mt. Middlemost's resident daredevil, who hung up his "cape" after an extreme jump went wrong. // Ms. Pam creates a sentient jar of jam who wins the hearts and minds of all who dine at the Middlemost Toast.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Boy in the Iceberg - When a young waterbender, named Katara, and her brother, Sokka, discover a giant iceberg while fishing for food around their homestead at the South Pole, they discover that there is a boy, named Aang, inside.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Avatar Returns - After Aang accidentally sets off a Fire Nation trap, he is banished from the South Pole. Soon after Prince Zuko attacks the Southern Water Tribe seeking to capture the Avatar. Aang returns and surrenders to save the Water Tribe.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Donut Disturb / The Cursed Amulet - Bester unwittingly uncovers the not so delicious goings on in Fritz Fritter's top secret Donut Wonderland Factory. // Best and Bester dig up Captain Ironfoot's Cursed Amulet on the beach only to find that Deep Sea Belle wants it too.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep118
programme.desc: That's So Cupid / Buddy Odour - Inspired by the latest Romcom release at the Movie Theatre, Best and Bester decide to go on a match-making mission. // Toot moves into the Sub with Best and Bester, but they find there's no getting away from her smell - literally!

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Chosen One... Stinks / Not Another Superhero Movie - Ollie's stinky sweat is a hot commodity in the Monsterverse, and makes a deal in exchange for it. // Ollie, Cleo and Bernie need to make an epic superhero movie to save Portshill High's Film Club.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Flip Flopas / Chill Bill - When the kids eat candy that makes good things taste bad forever, they set out on a quest to find an antidote. // A cool bass player who lives in an underground convenience store threatens to break up Sanjay and Craigs friendship.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Fish Talker / Wet Doom - Captain Man and Kid Danger use Schowz' Fish-Talker helmet to help a lost fish find his way home. // While stuck in a restaurant bathroom, Ray, Henry, Charlotte, Jasper, and Schwoz reminisce about past adventures.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Teeny Pelican Terry / Tappin Mo and Bo - A mama pelican thinks Teeny Terry is a baby bird... and adopts him! // Mo and Bo discover tap dancing, but the sound is disturbing everyone in the hotel.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Grumbles' First Cut / Fuzzly Ball - Grumbles needs a haircut, but he's afraid to get one. // Abby tries to throw the perfect Ball for Princess Flug.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep95
programme.desc: The Inmates of Summer / To Save a Squirrel - Instead of getting on the ship headed for summer camp, SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally board a ship full of prisoners on their way to jail on Inferno Island. // SpongeBob and Pat stow away on one of Sandys wilderness adventure.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep96
programme.desc: The Pest of the West - While researching his family tree SpongeBob discovers that he was related to the great Western hero, and famous chili-slinger, SpongeBuck.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep97
programme.desc: 20,000 Patties Under the Sea / The Battle of Bikini Bottom - SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs turn an old submarine into a mobile Krusty Krab. // When Patrick and SpongeBob discover they have clashing views on cleanliness, their disagreement blows up into an epic battle.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep98
programme.desc: What Ever Happened to SpongeBob - When SpongeBob tries to spend some quality time with his friends, he just ends up being a nuisance to everyone instead. They all tell him to go away, so with a heavy heart, SpongeBob decides to do just that.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep99
programme.desc: The Two Faces of Squidward / Spongehenge - Squidward is rushed to the hospital when SpongeBob accidentally slams the door on Squidwards face. // A very windy day in Bikini Bottom is blowing air through SpongeBob's holes resulting in a chorus of pertty flute-like sounds.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S05 Ep100
programme.desc: Banned in Bikini Bottom / Stanely S. Squarepants - Miss Priss, who is against all things fun and delicious, has Krabby Patties banned from Bikini Bottom! // When Stanley, SpongeBobs klutzy cousin, comes to visit Bikini Bottom, he quickly turns SpongeBobs life upside down.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: The Road Warrior - Alvin sounds the alarm when he believes Theodore has joined a motorcycle gang of vampires!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep507
programme.desc: My Fair Chipette - When Brittany declines Alvin's help for a talent show, he convinces Jeanette to enter, putting them at odds.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Gone Gal - When Miss Croner has a disagreement with Miss Miller, she fakes her disappearance to get even.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Bend It Like Abuelo / Bunstoppable - Hector finally joins his dream soccer team as their good luck charm, but what happens when his luck runs out? // While preparing bao for the Chinese Cultural Fair, Sid and Adelaide face off against time-hopping bandits!

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Friended! with the Casagrandes - Ronnie Anne makes friends with Sid, a girl whose family wants to rent the apartment upstairs. When it looks like another couple might get it first, the girls resort to sabotage to try and dissuade them.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Join Michael Rowland, Lisa Millar, Tony Armstrong, Bridget Brennan, Nate Byrne and the team for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the big names and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: ABC News Ep21
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Dan Bourchier presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Australian Story - The Making of Mini - Katrina Gorry Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - After the Matildas' World Cup glory, star midfielder Katrina Gorry introduces us to the tiny secret weapon who rekindled her love for the game. (Return)

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 1 - Essendon v Hawthorn Ep7

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - A Saturday Night Footy blockbuster in Geelong as the Cats host the St Kilda Saints in Round 1 of the AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 35 - Tammy visits a collector's colourful balcony; Costa meets multicultural community gardeners; Clarence profiles autumn flowering natives; Millie savours summer; plus we meet a florist creating sculptures with fruit and veg.

programme.title: Four Corners - Super Power Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The cost of living with Coles and Woolworths. We uncover the tactics used by supermarkets to keep prices high - and competition out. Both deny price gouging but there are now six inquiries and reviews targeting the duopoly.

programme.title: Price of Progress: Indonesia's Nickel Rush
programme.desc: The price of our transition to EVs. A mining and refining boom in Indonesia is creating jobs and boosting the economy, transforming lives as Indonesia races to become a global EV hub, powered by nickel.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Submission Specialists - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep505JoseAldoKingsMMAAndersonSilva
programme.desc: Jose Aldo gives us insight into his unique relationship with coach and lifelong friend Dede Pederneiras. Master Rafael Cordeiro gives a detailed history of world-renowned gym Kings MMA. UFC fighters explain why ten-time middleweight title defender Anderson Silva, was so iconic to the world of MMA.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC285JonesvsGane
programme.desc: At UFC 285, former 205-pound champ Jon Jones moves up to face Ciryl Gane for the heavyweight belt in the main event. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will face Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month Heavyweights - UFC Ultimate Knockouts celebrates Black History Month with a collection of the most powerful knockouts coming from the heavyweight division. See Francis Ngannou, Derrick Lewis, Curtis Blaydes, Walt Harris, and more.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep9
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Main Event - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev
programme.desc: Prelims - The heavyweights take center stage at the APEX on Sunday, March 3, when unbeaten rising star Shamil Gaziev looks to smash his way into the Top 15 when he faces noted knockout artist Jairzinho Rozenstruik in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in 12 pro fights, Bahrains Gaziev kept the momentum going from his win on Dana Whites Contender Series with a knockout of Martin Buday, and now hell tackle the equally imposing Rozenstruik, who has scored knockouts in all seven of his UFC wins, stopping Junior Dos Santos, Alistair Overeem and Andrei Arlovski in the process

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
